Thanks for that insight! That gives me one more hypothesis about what could cause this.

@{557058:434ecab2-e510-4ede-8f9a-1c2a5a4032e1} , could you try changing [this block](https://github.com/dartsim/dart/blob/e480e2f06bd8c0dbd0be6862b7e5b4cb01df6cdf/cmake/Findtinyxml2.cmake#L26-L29) to the following:

```
find_path(TINYXML2_INCLUDE_DIRS
    NAMES tinyxml2.h
    HINTS ${PC_TINYXML2_INCLUDEDIR}
    PATHS
      "${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/include"
      "/usr/include")
```

In theory the `find_path()` function should automatically search in `/usr/include` in step 5 [mentioned here](https://cmake.org/cmake/help/v3.5/command/find_path.html), but maybe the `CMAKE_SYSTEM_INCLUDE_PATH` variable is not getting set correctly?
